name: Hanyabal
text: [On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 purple {Impel Down} type card other than [Hanyabal] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 purple {Impel Down} type card other than [Hanyabal] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
